summary: WENT OUT TO GET IN MY CAR AND COME HOME AND IT WOULDN'T START.  IT WOULD ROLL OVER BUT NOTHING.  HAD TO CALL A TOW TRUCK TO COME TOW IT TO A REPAIR SHOP.  THOUGHT IT WAS JUST THE RADIATOR WITH A HOLE IN IT BUT WITH FURTHER INVESTIGATION INTO IT THE HEAD GASKET HAD BLOWN.  NO WORNING SIGNS THAT ANYTHING WAS WRONG .  THE HEAT GAUGE NEVER MOVED WHILE I WAS DRIVING IT.  NO LIGHTS NOTHING BEFORE LEAVING IT SIT FOR ABOUT 30 MIN AND COMING OUT TO A CAR THAT WOULDN'T START.
